name: Galactic Gulp
description:
In the depths of outer space, where giant bugs drift through the cosmos, the greatest space predator is: FROG.

Play as a giant space frog who is endlessly hungry. Controlling bizarre gravity powers to draw in its prey, assist the frog in satisfying its hunger in a never-ending struggle for survival. Tilt your device to manipulate gravity and guide space bugs into range, then slurp them up with a very long tongue, all the while making sure to avoid consuming any of the hazardous objects that are also drawn to the frog.
____________________________

FEATURES:
-110+ levels of bug-slurping, hazard-dodging action!
-Tilt your device to send space objects in any direction you please. The more you tilt, the faster they go!
-Move the frog with a single finger. It follows your touch as your finger runs along the screen.
-Tap anywhere on the screen to use the frog's long tongue to catch every bug in its path, then slurp them all up!
-Avoid colliding with or swallowing any inedible and other seriously harmful objects you find. Hazards abound!
-Interact with and avoid a diverse range of objects, with more spectacular threats as you progress through the game.
-Think quick, but avoid being rash, else you might end up eating more asteroids than you can chew (and also comets, and satellites, and worse).
-Compete with other players to get the highest score on the Game Center Leaderboard!
____________________________

Need support? Have feedback? Questions?
Contact support at: https://www.galacticgulp.com/support

NOTE: iPhone 5 and below not supported.
